entry.question: What does the Seeker tag mean? Why is it on them? Is it referenced anywhere outside these characters in the set?
entry.answer: Seeker is a new Trait created for ATP-2, as well as potential future design space to create additional Seeker characters or abilities/cards that key off of the trait. There are only three characters in the set with the Trait, and zero battle cards that reference the new Trait (currently). Note: Any older characters that are traditionally considered “Seekers” in Lore are NOT Seekers for this Trait’s purposes..for now..
